channel.title: llama on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in llama on Joone Blog

item.title: Contribution to Llama-recipes project
item.description: I’m excited to share my recent involvement in llama-recipes, a project used for fine-tuning Llama2. I’ve been engaged in fine-tuning the Lamma model since its open-source release. Initially, I utilized the alpaca-lora project, which enabled fine-tuning Lamma using a consumer’s NVidia GPU. This was a significant advantage as it allowed me to develop my own version of ChatGpt. However, the LLM industry moves at a rapid pace: Meta released Lamma2 shortly after.
